text: If the owner does not reply as provided for in § 42-3141.03(b)(1), (b)(2), or (b)(3), the owner shall be deemed to have authorized the Mayor to abate the graffiti. The Mayor may then abate the graffiti as if the owner had provided authorization under § 42-3141.03(b)(2).
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 5 of Anti-Graffiti Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-389, May 5, 2010, 57 DCR 4332).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-219, see notes following § 42-3141.01.

DC CODE § 42-3141.04

Current through December 11, 2012
